description: Detects specific process characteristics of Winnti malware noticed in Dec/Jan 2020 in a campaign against Honk Kong universities Author: Florian Roth, Markus Neis. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Winnti Malware HK University Campaign
query: ((process.parent.executable:(*C\:\\Windows\\Temp* OR *\\hpqhvind.exe*) AND process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\DRM*) OR (process.parent.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\DRM* AND process.executable:*\\wmplayer.exe) OR (process.parent.executable:*\\Test.exe AND process.executable:*\\wmplayer.exe) OR process.executable:"C\:\\ProgramData\\DRM\\CLR\\CLR.exe" OR (process.parent.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\DRM\\Windows* AND process.executable:*\\SearchFilterHost.exe))
